Posts.Content: Hi, I have been wondering and a bit confused by all the percentage chances we are given of recurrence.  Is there a difference in the chance of cancer returning locally to the chance of distant metastasis and again a difference in the chance in it coming back in the other breast??  Hope this makes sense! Tracey xx
Posts.Title: Chances of recurrence

Posts.Content: Can you do this yourself then on Adjuvant On Line? Thanks
